user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
screen_desc: The screenshot displays the PayPal login page, where users are prompted to enter their email address or mobile number to begin the login process. There are options to recover a forgotten email, proceed to the next step, or create a new account. The language selection option is also available at the bottom of the screen, offering English and Dutch.
